VII.ii.1.B.6.c
.
Action to Take When the Hines ITC Is Unable to Issue VA Form 21-8960-1
When the Hines Information Technology Center (ITC) cannot issue
VA Form 21-8960-1
,
VA’s claims-processing system generates work item 882H,
School Child Verification Letter Not Sent
.  When the work item appears in an RO's inventory, the RO must send the beneficiary a
VA Form 21-8960-1
.
To control for return of the form,
establish a future diary under diary code 30,
Local Regional Office Special Use
, in Share that expires the month after a 60-day period that begins the
later
of the following dates:
the date the work item was generated, or
the date the RO sent the form to the beneficiary, and
enter the comment
School Child Verification Development
in the COMMENT text box.
Reference
:  For more information on 800 series work items, see
M21-4, Appendix B
.
